Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.concordion.internal.util.Announcer
    Depricated due to performance issues - use java.util.List instead. When cross-compiled to Concordion.NET, the Announcers generate dynamic proxies that are realized by code compiled at run time. When profiled, the Announcer took 1460ms, vs 5ms for the list based solution. Easy Java bean event notification courtesy of Nat Pryce. [Source]
    org.concordion.integration.junit3.ConcordionTestCase
    As of release 2.0, JUnit 3 support is deprecated. With JUnit 5 on the horizon, we will be focussing on ongoing support for JUnit 4 and 5. Please updated your test cases to use the JUnit 4 support.
    org.concordion.internal.FileTargetWithSuffix
    Since this is overzealous and renames other resources, eg screenshots when using ScreenshotExtension. See issue #129. Users are encouraged to create their own implementations instead - eg. ExcelSuffixRenamingTarget.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.concordion.internal.AbstractResultSummary.assertIsSatisfied(Object)
    org.concordion.api.ResultSummary.assertIsSatisfied(Object)
    As of release 2.0, replaced by ResultSummary.assertIsSatisfied(Fixture fixture)
    org.concordion.api.SpecificationLocator.locateSpecification(Object)
    - use SpecificationLocator.locateSpecification(Object, String) instead Locates the specification for the named fixture, assuming a fixed type suffix (eg. HTML).
    org.concordion.internal.AbstractResultSummary.print(PrintStream, Object)
    org.concordion.api.ResultSummary.print(PrintStream, Object)
    As of release 2.0, replaced by ResultSummary.print(PrintStream, Fixture)
    org.concordion.internal.AbstractResultSummary.printCountsToString(Object)
    org.concordion.api.ResultSummary.printCountsToString(Object)
    As of release 2.0, replaced by ResultSummary.printCountsToString(Fixture)
    org.concordion.internal.FixtureRunner.run(Fixture)
    org.concordion.integration.junit4.ConcordionRunner.validateInstanceMethods(List<Throwable>)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.concordion.Concordion(SpecificationLocator, SpecificationReader, EvaluatorFactory, Fixture)
    use Concordion.Concordion(List, SpecificationLocator, SpecificationReader, EvaluatorFactory, Fixture) instead
